inclusion.criterion: Residence in Doneguebougou, Mali or Bancoumana
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Available for the duration of the trial (52 weeks)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willingness to participate in the study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Evidence of clinically significant neurologic, cardiac, pulmonary, hepatic, rheumatologic, autoimmune, chronic infectious or renal disease
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Laboratory evidence of liver disease (ALT greater than 1.25 times the upper limit of normal)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Laboratory evidence of renal disease (serum creatinine greater than the upper limit of normal, or more than trace protein or blood on urine dipstick testing)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a healthy woman with no underlying diseases. She has had her flu shot this year and exercises regularly.
